locations.name: London
locations.description: The vibrant capital of the UK, serving as the starting point. Known for its history, royal parks, West End shows, museums, and diverse neighbourhoods.

locations.name: Scottish Highlands (representative location: Fort William)
locations.description: A vast mountainous region in northern Scotland. While the exact location isn't specified, a town like Fort William serves as a common base for exploring the dramatic landscapes, lochs (like nearby Loch Linnhe), and mountains (like Ben Nevis) described.

locations.name: The Cotswolds (representative location: Stow-on-the-Wold)
locations.description: An Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty in south-central England. The description points to staying within this region known for charming villages. Stow-on-the-Wold is a quintessential, centrally located Cotswold market town fitting the description of honey-coloured stone, antique shops, and old pubs.
